item.title: Faster Angular Applications - Understanding Differs. Developing a Custom IterableDiffer
item.description: In this article we’ll take a look at another Angular abstraction - the differs and more specifically the IterableDiffer; we’ll explain what the differs are and how the framework uses them internally. After that, we’ll take a look at how NgForOf works and design a custom data structure optimized for the directive. Finally, we’ll develop a custom differ which will speed up the change detection mechanism of Angular when working with large collections.
